He added some briefcomments on the possible effects on Prance andother countries still on the Gold Standard. Whilethe future was full of uncertainties, he did not,at the moment, see any reason to take too anxious aview of the situation.The President of the Board of Trade added a fewremarks as to the views of a number of representativebusiness men whom he had met the same morning.
